1.text: Choose the paper for your card.

2.text: Fold 2 pieces of card stock or colorful paper in half.

3.text: Make 2 cuts in the center of the card that are 1-inch long.

4.text: Open the card and push the tab out.
4.vid: /9/91/Make a Pop Up Card Step 4 Version 11.360p.mp4

6.text: Attach the pop-up image to the tab.
6.vid: /f/f0/Make a Pop Up Card Step 6 Version 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Secure the second piece of paper to the card with the pop up.
7.vid: /1/1b/Make a Pop Up Card Step 7 Version 9.360p.mp4

8.text: Decorate and sign the pop-up card.
8.vid: /1/16/Make a Pop Up Card Step 8 Version 9.360p.mp4

9.text: Get out a card or fold your decorative paper in half.

10.text: Draw the pop-up image on a separate piece of decorative paper.

11.text: Draw small tabs on the sides of your pop-up image.
11.vid: /8/82/Make a Pop Up Card Step 11 Version 9.360p.mp4

12.text: Cut out the image with the tabs and fold it in half.
12.vid: /8/81/Make a Pop Up Card Step 12 Version 4.360p.mp4

13.text: Draw a line halfway through the image and fold it in half.
13.vid: /a/a9/Make a Pop Up Card Step 13 Version 4.360p.mp4

14.text: Fold the tabs back to make a V-fold.
14.vid: /1/10/Make a Pop Up Card Step 14 Version 4.360p.mp4

15.text: Attach the tabs or V-folded image to the center of your card.
15.vid: /a/ac/Make a Pop Up Card Step 15 Version 4.360p.mp4

16.vid: /3/38/Make a Pop Up Card Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4
